title: Westcott 15968 Right-Handed Scissors, Kids' Scissors, Ages 4-8, 5-Inch Blunt Tip, Blue
description: These 5-inch blunt scissors are specially designed for a child's hand. Complete with molded, symmetrical handles for increased comfort and control, these cute scissors allow for either left- or right-handed use. Stainless steel blades make these school scissors both accurate and dependable. The perfect scissors for school kids, these mini scissors cut through paper, fabric, string, and other craft materials easily. Westcott is dedicated to supporting education and inspiring creative activities in the classroom and at home. Westcott products, including our preschool scissors, are specifically designed for growing students and created to be fun and functional with superior quality and exceptional value.
